  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO DOOR 14 UNLOAD FOR A LEAKING PACKAGE. RESPONDER PICKED UP THE PACKAGE/5 GALLON BUCKET AND BROUGHT IT BACK TO THE DMP AREA FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. RESPONDER NOTED THAT THE BUCKET WAS LEAKING DUE TO A LOOSE CAP.
